I ordered my usual size, and it fits perfectly with the exact oversizing.  I would definitely order again, but didn't care for the other colors. The black with the white has been called stunning by one compliment. It is a pretty warm sweater, and seems to be appropriate for winter. I think it is too heavy for even Fall. It is a great buy.

This sweater is awesome … the white accents really makes  the sweater unique . The cut is super stylish and so comfy to wear. Its worth every penny ! Love it !!!

The quality compares with popular brands.

I loved this sweater BUT then I washed it (followed care instructions) it fell apart, the material looked like crap after one washing and it shrunk when I hand dried it.  Very disappointing.

I got this and was hoping the quality looked as nice as it did in photos, and it is! It’s nice, thick material and has the cute stitching on the sleeves and sides like it shows. The green color is the same as shown in photos as well. I got a size XXL and it fits very well! I’m 5’4 and 225ish lbs. It’s slightly oversized so if I wanted form fitting, I’m sure I could have gotten away with XL if I wanted, the sweater is slightly cropped and sits a few inches below the belly button, maybe where mid rise or low rise jeans would sit nowadays. Very easy to tuck into things if you like to tuck. The sleeves are wide, so it’s not really a good sweater if you like to roll up your sleeves.
The style and fit is flattering.  You might consider going down a size.  It’s very roomy but stays stylish none the less.  Wear with jeans, black or white cords.  I love this sweater!
Really wanted this to work but it is huge on me. Too wide, too long, sleeves too long. Returning. Fabric is good quality. I'm 5'1" 125 lbs, 36D, for reference.

This sweater has become my go-to so far this winter. I first purchased it in brown, but I didn’t like the shade. It wasn’t a true Brown. I can’t explain it. It just didn’t look good on me. I returned it and got the black one. I love this sweater. It runs true to  size and it’s very soft. The whip stitching is a nice feature and I get a lot of compliments on it. I wear it with a sleeveless turtleneck underneath because I like a higher turtleneck. This one is more of a mock. Nevertheless, I love it.
Love the sweater, but a has a pulled string. 😞
Comfortable, great looking sweater! I would recommend!

Such a great sweater, 5 stars for sure.  Comfortable to wear all day.  Warm sweater but not overly warm, just perfect for the winter days I am experiencing in Kansas.  The fit is very complementary to my body type.  I’m a true Medium, I ordered a medium and the sweater runs true to size.  It’s so versatile, I can wear with jeans for casual occasions or with a pair of dress pants or a skirt.  It’s amazing, Colors purchased were burgundy and khaki, both colors were the exact same in fit, quality and comfort.  It’s a perfect sweater for me!  Great gift idea too.  Love all the color choices this sweater comes with, hard to pick just one.

5.7, 160 Lbs.  XL. So beautiful, such style and great shade of pink.  I have to return for L as the  XL is too big in shoulders and arms.  It’s warm enough for west coast weather, and nice against skin, meaning it doesn’t scratch.  Not thin, ample coverage!!  Quality is great.  Good for price.

The sweater is cute. Fabric feels nice. Semi heavy sweater. But, it came shrink wrapped, which created such deep wrinkles that I don’t think they’ll ever come completely out. I threw it in the dryer, which usually works to get wrinkles out of sweaters. & it did get most of them out. But there is a deep crease right across the middle that appears to be a dark line. But it’s a deep imbedded crease. Why on earth would you ever shrink wrap a knitted sweater? If it wasn’t for the imbedded crease I would have given 5 stars.

I'm totally obsessed with this brand! Everything they create is super comfy, well-crafted, and just gorgeous! I recently snagged this oversized pullover sweater in Black with white stitching, and I can't wait to grab it in more colors! I've been getting so many compliments—This one is a yes!

Loved the concept but actual product was not flattering. Color made me look washed out

This is probably one of my fave purchases from Amazon to date. I’m a sucker for a chunky, oversized knit, and this one did not disappoint. From the girly color, to the fabric, and even the fit. This piece is a bit big on me so I definitely could’ve sized down to a small and still had plenty of space to play around with, but I went with my normal size (medium) and absolutely love the roominess of it. The material is comfortable and light on the skin. I don’t feel any itchiness…not even at the seams. I haven’t worn it out, so I’m unsure if I’ll sweat in it yet. The arms are somewhat long, but I like that because I don’t care for my hands to be too exposed during the colder months anyway. The longer sleeves just provide a little bit of extra warmth. This sweater seems like it’s meant to be somewhat of a longer/wider “crop” top. Since it does run big it actually falls further than my hips. I just tuck it in at the front so it looks super cute and trendy. For reference I’m 5’3”, 152 lbs and 36C.
Beautiful color but contrast stitching sticks up in a pronounced way that is uncomfortable and looks odd. I returned.
Perfect oversized sweater! FP dupe. Love!
